TopicTitle: [VIDEO] After reading about the Nostromo, Commander Jeb demanded he get to fly it...

Articles.Content:
Hey guys,

As soon as I saw the Nostromo I knew it had to be taken for a spin:
Does it have an emergency shuttle? And how many crew members? My god, it's Beautiful!

You can grab it from here:

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/showthread.php/12477-0-15-Alien-Nostromo-(ver-1-1)
Look closely on the 3-man pod and you'll see a Weyland-Yutani logo. Were your minmus and mun arch landings on the same trip?
They were. It was my maiden and only Nostromo flight so far. I'm looking into other large craft at the moment.
